website_summaries.verdict: This multipurpose knife is thin enough to slip in a wallet, so it's always ready when you need it.
pros: Blade is thinner than 2 credit cards
Titanium carbon blade cuts cardboard, paper, plastics, coroplast, foam board, gator board, wood, film and acetate
Ball-chain and hanging hole for convenient neck wear
cons: Good mostly for smaller jobs, not heavy duty use

customer_reviews.title: Clever little knife
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this little thing! Another reviewer pointed out it is thin enough to fit in a wallet if the clip is removed, and I agree. This knife has a clever design that locks the blade open. It came to us razor sharp. The blade is sharpened on only one side, not that this is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen B

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and small knife, very thin. Disappears in your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little knife that fits in my pocket almost unnoticeable. The way the blade folds in though, the edge of the blade is a bit exposed and I have nicked my finger a few times reaching into my pocket. The blade doesn't fold into the knife like an ordinary folding pocket knife, that's why it can be so thin. Still handy though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Good knife, not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Knife looks like its a steel/silver color but upon arriving its all black, it does still have the dragon engraving which makes it worth the purchase but just be aware
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: I like it i'm going to use it as amoney clip
customer_reviews.text: I like it i'm going to use it as amoney clip. It's pretty sharp and i especially like the dragon on it.
customer_reviews.author: frankie ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: Perfect knife to fit in my wallet. Very sharp and handy for opening various packages and boxes. I have already bought 3 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Carson H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but not worth returning
customer_reviews.text: Barely see the dragon etched in. Disappointed but not worth returning. Not for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is so flat but am always worried ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is so flat but am always worried something will catch on the blade since it's not covered up.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Mayfair

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and thin
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and thin. Almost sharp. The bigger disappointed is in the etching; my dragon had a tail but no face.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Loving it. Small enough to carry but sturdy enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cool, little knife. Fits in my pocket easily. Works well for opening small packages and other household chores.
customer_reviews.author: TODMTNS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: clip is too big, makes it "fat" in wallet. seemed OK else-wise but i tossed it
customer_reviews.author: noel pulanco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the wallet. Even gets through security undetected!
customer_reviews.author: Randall C. Manaka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Like the money clip feature. Not flimsy. Very rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars Everything I wanted in baby knife! SHARP ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars Everything I wanted in baby knife! SHARP, small & tight lock open/closed.
customer_reviews.author: George constantino

customer_reviews.title: It is a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made knife, thin yet solid. The belt clip is perfect and the knife conceals just right..
customer_reviews.author: Calamansi Craig

customer_reviews.title: handy and portable. be sure you don't take to ...
customer_reviews.text: handy and portable.be sure you don't take to airport or you will lose it.
customer_reviews.author: yoshn

customer_reviews.title: Nice blade, but a little small.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller then I thought, but over all its a great little knife for a back pocket or a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Delighted no end as this was way better quality than I expected at very good price. Cannot understand some negative reviews. Mine was perfect! so pleased I intend to buy two more. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Theosophist

customer_reviews.title: Great on price great value
customer_reviews.text: This a great EDC it takes very little room and it sharpens very well thsnk you.
customer_reviews.author: gun guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, cuts when its supposed to and small. The clip is hard to remove and the locking mechanism is decent for smaller jobs.
customer_reviews.author: SgtCuddlez

customer_reviews.title: Make sure blade is locked, silly me
customer_reviews.text: You must make sure the blade is locked. One time it was not all the way locked and I cut my finger. I loved the design, It is a bit darker than I imagined but that is ok. I got it to for legal conceal carry and it was so small I barely noticed it was around my waist everyday. I lost it so eventually I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: ZK

customer_reviews.title: No Knife in My Front Pocket
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need a pocket knife to do, and it fits in my wallet. I'm liking it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MTSOfan

customer_reviews.title: cute little thing... almost the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: cute little thing...almost the same as the larger one, though a little less polished...no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: great design and handy for front pocket carry
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great design and handy for front pocket carry.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Knife!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is quite impressive! Solid build! Has a to rivit at the hinge point which is nice because it won't unscrew itself over time. Everyone at my work now wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Jay N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my nephew. He truly likes it.
customer_reviews.author: GodCynt2

customer_reviews.title: Good gift, convienent.
customer_reviews.text: Good, convient, small, thin, sharp, and attached to our key chain. Not likely you will cut yourself while closed unless you are messing with it because only one side is sharpened. Has cut through most things we've needed to. Husbands knife opened on him only once while attached to his keys on his belt loop, he's had it for several months, not likely to happen again, but possible. One of his every day carry knives.
customer_reviews.author: larisa

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on my keychain, it comes in so handy to open things and cut Paracord,great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife because the size and its ability to fit places my other knives can't. It comes pretty sharp out of the box, sharp enough to cut the hairs on my arm at least. The only thing I didn't like at first was closing it, it was kind of tuff at first but after a couple times it's no problem. Over all I would recommend this knife to anyone that wasn't a small cheap knife with a cool design on it. Nicely done BELK
customer_reviews.author: Christian Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good item like it a lot very handy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Buy two
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this knife fore about 5 years now. Its not meant to be heavy duty but man is it durable. And it can take a real beating. I love how slim and convenient it is to carry. I can barely tell its in my pocket. The blade comes pretty sharp and I have only had to sharpen it like 3 times over the last five years. I loved it so much i bought a second one for my emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Al-Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: They are like cheaply made versions of the Boker plus card knife
customer_reviews.text: They sell these exact knives many places in Asia, most of them come from the same Chinese factories. They are like cheaply made versions of the Boker plus card knife, which is also cheaply made. These will not hold up to really do anything useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

product_meta.title: BELK #1 Thin Card Knife Carbon Black Miniature Hobby Craft Folding Knives with 1mm(0.039In) Depth, 1.5in Length Blade for School & Home & Office Routine
product_meta.description:
BELK Art Knife At a Glance 
BELK utility folding knife comes with a clever blend of quality,looks,functionality and easy accessibility features warrant you picking up 
the tab just to show it off.However,please do not stop before the looks.As a back-up knife,it is more functional than cool profile. 

Attention to Details 

Tenacious stainless steel body 
Made from stainless steel, this Knife retaining stiffness advantage 
married with titanium carbon black coating is designed for daily use, school & office chores or medium duty outdoor tasks. 

Ideal for back to school students 
So thin and small size,when the idea strikes your brain,just fetch it from your pocket or pen case, peel your pencils and plotting your thinkings. 
Convenient storage and carry thanks to the pocket clip and ball chain holes... 

Safety Lock 
Liner lock in the most brief construction design to keep simple and minimal. 

Specifications 

* Open Length: 4.3 
* Blade Length: 1.5 
* Closed Length: 2.8 
* Width: 1.18 
* Height: 0.039 
* Weight: 1.19 oz 
* Lock Style: Integral Lock 
* Shape of Point: Drop point 
* Pocket Clip: Yes 
* Package: Frustration-free & safe packing
feature_bullets: Only 2.8-in closed length,thinner than 2 credit cards blade
Ideal utility tool with geometric figure hollowed for drawing, plotting, mapping, drafting and
Sturdy blade in titanium carbon black coating for daily chores like cutting cardboard, paper,
MORE WAYS TO CARRY--Integrated dragon engraved blade and handle with ultra tight pocket clip,
Easeful grip and control by the detail considered recessed finger grooves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
